title: EdAble Donation System
description: Custom complex donations system for a charitable diability non-profit (EdAble). Allows for donations to associated mircro-businesses and donation campaigns, using PayPal payments. Hosted with Azure webservices. Completed as a group project during Advanced Diploma.

title: Portfolio
description: This portfolio website, coded in an Angular environment with Bootstrap styling and components. Hosted with Netlify to utilise Netlify Forms for the contact page.

title: HexSweeper
description: My first for fun project, written as I learnt Javascript - a minesweeper-like game with hexagonal tiles. Working to extend with React to implement a high-score functionality.

title: My next Project - Random Reminder
description: A reminder/todo App with the ability to randomise reminder times for things like 'remind me to drink water about once an hour'. Currently a web-based prototype to determine design etc.
